title: I don't like *champion here*, therefor he/she must be unbalanced and you are a noob for disagreeing
body:
http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130505163711/dragonsdogma/images/6/61/Kappa.gif

I am \*insert unimpressive elo here*, so your opinion doesn't matter.

replies.body:
Gameplay in a nutshell. 

I don't understand why I can't leave it alone.
I am just addicted to the salt http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lm2nltLzyL1qgcg2ko1_500.gif
Like potato chips? The saltyness makes them addictive once you eat one you just can't stop.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/003/011/b65.gif

Salt and vinegar are my favorite chip flavors. 

Holy fuck I am a masochist.
I love salt and vinegar.... Although baked cheddar and sour cream is my favorite.

I'm not a fan of chedder flavored chips (though I can't remember the last time I had them). 

I'm actually considered weird to my family because despite my Italian roots I don't like having cheese on a lot of things.

You... you don't like cheese?
https://media.giphy.com/media/yHUiExmU40A4U/giphy.gif

On a lot of things. 
I would hate a world without pizza.

http://media.meme4u.com/invites/birthday-invitation/273-you-are-invited.gif

Greetings! *The Men Who Giggle* discord server is an exclusive gathering of the dankest individuals! We have funny memes, sexy art, fluffy animals, and more! If you are interesting in joining, respond here with a yes for your invite link!
Yes please.  Sorry I didn't respond earlier, wanted to make sure I was on a computer and not a cell phone for this.

UMMMM... YES!
HOW HAS ANYONE NOT RESPONDED???
what blasphemy is this? "i dont like having cheese"
[http://i.makeagif.com/media/6-01-2014/PmUdkx.gif](http://i.makeagif.com/media/6-01-2014/PmUdkx.gif)
Amen.
And the majority of those posts are calling for {{champion:222}} / {{champion:157}} nerfs.

When people secretly downvote their post and they get more salty.. xD

http://rs738.pbsrc.com/albums/xx24/ronic-kun/Kappa%20Mikey/ozu03xD.gif~c200
http://cdn2.mommyish.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/fit-throwing-llama1.gif
To be fair though, if you downvote me then at least give me the reason why. We can talk it out
You don't main * insert said champion here *, so how would you know if * said champion * is OP/UP? * starts pointing out easy counters to said champion *
*downvotes into oblivion because I am too emotional insecure to admit I am wrong*
_Downvoted myself so that I can complain about you downvoting me._

*whines about how you can't be right because ur wrong*

*downvotes to make himself feel better but ultimately knows he is bronze 5 trash*

To be fair, Fiora is impossible to balance currently and I still see people saying it can be done post rework.

Such is the nature of % hp true damage.

They can't argue against it, so they simply label me an idiot or they argue in circles using points I've already refuted.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2IpE7TTn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-03T14:44:35.683+0000)
>
> To be fair, Fiora is impossible to balance currently and I still see people saying it can be done post rework.
> 
> Such is the nature of % hp true damage.
> 
> They can't argue against it, so they simply label me an idiot or they argue in circles using points I've already refuted.

Kinda ironic to say it coming from the guy with the Katarina icon. Just saying.
Implying I actually main Kat, not simply enjoy the icon.
I main kat and can confirm she has many more problems than cc.... *flashbacks from chogath mid meta*

Oh god, don't remind me of those nightmares...

Even the brief times I did main Katarina, I couldn't stand to lane against Cho.

The only good thing about them is that they weren't as bad as my nightmares with Old Fiora vs Pantheon in top lane.
CHOGATH CHANGES U CAN FINALLY DODGE HIS SILENCE NOW... still hell though
Katarinas problem is too much raw damage not uncounterable damage

its not even  just raw damage look at {{champion:122}}  its just that fact she deals it all before you can even react is where we have the problem if people could have a moment where they can respond to her burst most wouldnt have a problem then again i could be wrong since people still hate {{champion:238}}

its not all done before you can react but it does chunk alot on the side of things that have poor defensive options and her whole kit does so much aoe damage and none of it is low because she has aoe i really want to know what champ deisgners smoke Rossboomsocks got it right also a reset so high i rests all of her basic skills not even needing to level them past level 1 or cdr to be completely effective  might as well just say full reset on her skills and  half the ult cd.
darius is a problem cause of his ad steriod on top of his bleed you are punished for even tradeing and more for an extended trade also he has an exicute that you can defend against and it scales a shit ton. 
Zed players say that you need to bait out his w but he has lower cooldown poke than you for free  so by time you are threatening to zed  he already won lane and when he kills you he can run away leave you alive and the only thing you can do to it is run into another one of his teammates giving them the kill just to bm him.
People will put down defensive items as ways to counter them but thats not counter play counter play is when you can play around it well enough that you force them to build defensive items for you and the only way to do that is to be someone more broken or unfun to play against than them like Aureloion Sol or  Azir or some ish

... what?

ima be honest the most I could gather from your post is that she has a ton of near instant aoe damage, rest of it flew by my head.

reminded me of one of my posts tbh.

You forgot the 
https://img.itch.io/aW1hZ2UvMjE4OTgvODY4NjIuZ2lm/original/2sL6J6.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2IpE7TTn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-03T14:44:35.683+0000)
>
> To be fair, Fiora is impossible to balance currently and I still see people saying it can be done post rework.
> 
> Such is the nature of % hp true damage.
> 
> They can't argue against it, so they simply label me an idiot or they argue in circles using points I've already refuted.

She's the best champion 0:       <- opinion
And her winrate is almost exactly 50% currently, much more balanced than a bunch of other champs currently
She's very fair until she becomes unfair, because she got an advantage from outplaying some mofo two or three times.

Fiora's balance is her learning curve, kind of like Azir... but if you want a simple way to always stomp a Fiora in lane, Pick {{champion:68}} 
(Definitely not just advertising my main, Rumble is actually a solid counter to Fiora)

Honestly balancing off of a learning curve or making the champion hard to play is extremely toxic. {{champion:268}} and {{champion:429}} are victims of this and look what happened to them. I think that it would be better if the hard champions werent so incredibly rewarding that they are either broken or just garbage. Instead, make the champions have a decent skill floor but are better when mastered, but not to the point of Azir and Kalista level where to be somewhat balanced they need to be gutted.
But Fiora is possible to balance as she is most match ups are just skill based since all her damage is tied to her vitals a huge portion of her power is put in her Pasive and and reposition

Played Cho'Gath the other day blind pick in the top lane, and was up against a first time Lissandra. Classic Q W AA with a thunderlords proc took care of half there health, "Cho'Gath is so op, he needs to be nerfed." Sides were in orbit at that statement. 

And then when I killed her with Feast, "Yeah he is too op why did they think an ult that did that much damage was a good idea." It was too good. Could have made it a drinking game with how often they said OP.

Some people will call ANYTHING that stomps them OP. It's sad because it blinds them from the mistakes they're making and makes them believe that coincidentally, everything they lose to is broken.  

There should be a PSA saying that just because you lose to a champion frequently/ don't know how to play against them does not make the champion unbalanced.

I main {{champion:17}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:35}} I get yelled at almost everyday for playing "OP" champions. They are not overpowered, you just cant be mentally retarded playing against them.

This is incredibly true for each of the champions you mentioned.

Sometimes when I play Swain, I laugh at how some teams just ALLOW me to demolish half of their champions in teamfights.
when I play swain, I laugh at how much I feed.
Swain only feeds Beatrice

B-but, I did this post already!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/3j2aVhWu-champion-needs-nerfdeletion

Oh well, you can't really hold a monopoly on a type of post.
Right now its " X Pro player went godlike on a certain champion, so that champion must be OP "
how is {{champion:268}} 1 champion when he has Soldiers? that out numbers most champs so that means he is OP and can make his own team fights. Riot Please Remove {{champion:268}} for being too OP
Goddammit the League board community you're awesome. But...why do i feel like you don't exist in-game? {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
I thought you were discussing racism in the united states for a second,  there.
